author: rush3112
title: Entry in India with OCI and Passport expiring soon
text: My case overseas passport expiring in less than 6 months and have OCI. Three questions. 1)Do I need new passport to enter India or can use my current passport with less than 6 month validity when I enter? 2) can I stay in India till my current passport expires ? 3) can I obtain my new overseas passport when I am in India and travel back on new passport? Reply from Indian embassy for all of the above questions Dear Sir, OCI card holders can travel to India at any time with a valid passport. There is no expiry of OCI visa and person can stay in India as long as the passport is valid.
